EmailTemplate.name: Foundation Stage Sports day
EmailTemplate.subject: Foundation stage sports day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
I would like to apologise for the short notice given when cancelling the Foundation Stage sports day this morning. When I arrived at 7am it was looking fine but then the heavens opened. We had to make the decision before starting the event and I apologise for any inconvenience caused for you. We are going to reschedule for Tuesday 25th June from 9 â€“ 11am and it would be great to see you all there.
Kindest regards,
Mr Adam Hoult
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
